column2: Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
One of the few women to rule in Araby, her enlightened reign has helped revive Al-Haikk into the thriving hub of culture and trade it once was.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
He brought the Light of Ormazd to the idol worshippers and founded the great cities of Araby. His many descendants continue to honor his legacy and Ormazd between feuds.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
The earthly avatar of the Elven goddess Isha and a being of incredible power. Together with her consort Orion she leads the Asrai and protects the sacred wood of Athel Loren.
Cursed Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
The first Phoenix King, by drawing the Sword of Khaine in defense of Ulthuan he condemned his descendants to the blade's curse.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
A Phoenix King famed for uniting Ulthuan against the mad Witch King Malekith, he built the Gates of Ulthuan and reclaimed the Blighted Isle from his corrupted bretheren.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
A celebrated Elven explorer and hero, under his guidance trade was opened between the races of the Old World and Ulthuan, ushering in a new Elven golden age.
Cursed Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] attempted to pass the flames of Asuryan, like the Witch King they were found unworthy.
Cursed Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] attempted to pass the flames of Asuryan, like the Witch King they were found unworthy.
Redeemed Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] passed the flames of Asuryan, unlike their ancestor they were found worthy, forever redeeming their dynasty.
Redeemed Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] passed the flames of Asuryan, unlike their ancestor they were found worthy, forever redeeming their dynasty.
Same Dynasty as [From.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Another Dynasty Member passing the flames will deactivate this bloodline
column3: Another Dynasty Member passing the flames will deactivate this bloodline

column2: Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
A mighty Grail Knight and virtuous King, he died valiantly defending Couronne against the Chaos Lord Akrim, his sacrifice allowed his knights to escape certain death.
Pious Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Though born into modest means, Repanse was rewarded for her piety and nobility of spirit after she rallied retreating knights to break the siege of Couronne.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
A legendary raider and the first High King of Norsca, the world shall tremble should the like of his realm ever be seen again. His cruel progeny continue fight among his scraps.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
A legendary raider. He led numerous raids against the Bretonni, going so far as to successfully lay siege to Couronne.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
He founded the first and largest human settlement in the New World, naming it after his daughter, Skeggi, the first human born in the New World.
Malignant Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
A legendary despoiler who has wrought war and destruction upon the lands of the Lands of Order.
Exalted Blood of the Great Kurgan
The Great Kurgan is the only known name of a legendary and near mythical Champion of Chaos who once ruled the entirety of the Eastern Steppes and the Kurgan people.
The Great Kurgan is the only known name of a legendary and near mythical Champion of Chaos who once ruled the entirety of the Eastern Steppes and the Kurgan people.
Pretentious Blood of the Great Kurgan
Glorius Blood of Teiyogtei Khagan

Teiyogtei was the Khagan of the Tong Tsavag tribe, a great warrior who had never been bested in battle. His frame was straight and tall, his limbs corded with iron-knots of muscle, his chest swollen with strength.
Accursed Blood of Cormac Blood Axe

The son of the slain High-King Varag Skulltaker, Cormac harboured a soul-blackening hatred towards the newly ascendant Empire that had slaughtered and driven his people back to the barren northlands. His greatest resentment was reserved for the Unberogens and their king Sigmar Heldenhammer, who had led the charge against the Northern tribes.
Wretched Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
First among the Brides of Khaine, unparalleled in her mastery in the ways of murder, the depths of her cruelty remain unique even among her cruel kind.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
The first Slayer King of Karak Kadrin, his successors inherited his kingdom and his oath. Just as he was, they are honor-bound to wage endless war in search of a heroic death.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
The last King of Eight Peaks, he fell with his ironbreakers against invading hordes of Skaven and Greenskins. His descendants have long fought to restore his honor.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
The so-called Doom of the Elves, he brought incredible violence upon elf-kind for their perfidy. Alongside his uncle, King Gotrek Starbreaker, he settled the War of Vengeance.
Blood of [This.GetDynName]
A byword for skillful swordsmanship, he became quite possibly the greatest living duelist in his pursuit of revenge.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick ]

A legendary ruler and warrior who had, after thousands of years, managed to re-unite Tilea and Estalia once again into one grand empire. Some say [This.GetSheHe] is the reincarnation of Myrmidia herself...
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is an ancient, ruthless, and venerable servant of the Dragon Emperor tasked with taming the Jungles of Lustria.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] achieved the ultimate goal of demonhood from the ruinous powers
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick].
Kharan the Blighted was a mighty Chaos Lord of Nurgle who led one of the most devastating Chaos invasions in Bretonnian history.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]

[This.GetfirstName] was a fabled Cathayan warrior who had driven off the Jade vampires from the Dragon Isles, thus ending their threat and re-opening communications with Cathay and the Dragon Emperor.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
Blood of Fatandira

Fatandira saw herself as an enlightened monarch. Though she carved out her lands with blood and fire, she sought to create a land free of the bigotry and hate that imprisons the minds of the Borderlanders. She had little ambition about extending her territory, and seemed content to hold what she had taken.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
Crowned Empress as an infant, her sham coronation caused more fractures in an already fractured Empire. She enjoys the generous support of Marienburg's merchant class.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
After a particularly violent falling out at an electoral conclave, the Count of Middenland had himself declared The Wolf Emperor on the advice of the Ar-Ulric.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
The Reiklander Emperors are seen as the legitimate claimants by the Sigmarite Church, though this has only deepened the sectarian divisions between claimants.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
She broke centuries of electoral deadlock by blaspheming Sigmar and declaring herself Empress, shattering the empire into rival claimants and sectarian infighting.
Imperial Blood of the Glorious
The glorious restorer of The Empire,champion of Order,beloved of the Imperium. [This.GetHerHisCap] legacy echoes through history,[This.GetHerHis] name synonymous with greatness.
Despotic Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Just as the despicable and torturous elves of the far west and the vicious slavemongers of the east,this character was infamous for [This.GetHerHisCap} cruel tendency of throwing dissidents into a bull-shaped furnace.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick ]
The great restorer of The Empire, champion of Order, bane of Man's foes. [This.GetHerHisCap] legacy echoes through history, [This.GetHerHis] name synonymous with greatness.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]
Patron of magic. Without their daring new laws, mages would not be able to exist openly as loyal citizens. [This.GetHerHisCap] legacy echoes through history.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
She led the Gospodars over the mountains and into the lands now known as Kislev. Her daughter Shoika was the first Tzarina and founded the Bokha line.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
The mysterious progenitor of the Carstein bloodline, he earned the undying loyalty of the Sylvanian people and mastered the inscrutable secrets of Nagash.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
The final Count of Sylvania, his madness and cruelty echoed the twisted land he ruled over.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]

Back in the ancient days of Nehekhara at the peak of its power, in the city of Lahmia, a warrior known as Abhorash dwelt. He was the protector of Lahmia's queen, Neferata, and had sworn always to uphold her honour and defend the kingdom from any threat, commanding the queen's personal bodyguard as their captain. He was a peerless swordsman even in those days, and ancient scrolls found in the sandy ruins told of his legendary skill and loyalty, his heart filled with love for his people, but with an even greater love for his queen.
Blood of The Red Duke
He was known in his life as a peerless warrior and proved himself to be the same in his unlife. His mad quest for vengeance has visited terror on his former realm.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
The self-declared Pirate King of the Vampire Coast, his shattered mind was never an obstacle in his quest for artifacts, plunder, and the best sea shanties.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
The first vampire, Queen of Lahmia, and spymaster without peer, her fell sorceries that gave unlife to all vampires.
Blood of [This.GetFirstName]
Brother of Neferata, his bestial bloodline is all that her's is not. His followers are fanatically loyal, but have long been dispersed by the fall of Mourkain.
Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Called the Father of Vampires, it was he that led Neferata down the dark path of necromancy and taught her the forbidden lore of Nagash.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] single handedly brought victory in several Black Crusades, and there are numerous legends spun in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] honor.
Relentless Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] is known for personally leading the charge of many battles in the Black Crusades, and it is said none could ever bring [This.GetHerHim] down.
Chaos Lord Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] was given rule of [This.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName] after a Black Crusade.
Daemonic Blood of the Voice of Tzeentch
Inspired by Tzeentch, [This.GetTitledFirstName] managed to lead a successful Black Crusade to destroy Kislev when [This.GetSheHe] was merely a child.
